org.jetlang.core

Interface DisposingExecutor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Executor
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Fiber, RunnableExecutor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FiberStub, RunnableExecutorImpl, SynchronousDisposingExecutor, ThreadFiber

    public interface DisposingExecutor
extends Executor
    An Executor that can dispose other components in unison with itself.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(Disposable disposable)
      Add a Disposable to be disposed when this component is disposed
      boolean remove(Disposable disposable)
      Remove a Disposable from being disposed when this component is disposed
      int size()
      Return the number of Disposable instances registered with this instance.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.util.concurrent.Executor

        execute

    • Method Detail

      • add

        void add(Disposable disposable)
        Add a Disposable to be disposed when this component is disposed
        Parameters:
        disposable - Disposable instance. Should not be null.

      • remove

        boolean remove(Disposable disposable)
        Remove a Disposable from being disposed when this component is disposed
        Parameters:
        disposable - Disposable instance. Should not be null
        Returns:
        True if the supplied Disposable was successfully removed. False if it wasn't available to be removed

      • size

        int size()
        Return the number of Disposable instances registered with this instance.

        This method is typically used for testing and debugging purposes.

        Returns:
        Number of Disposable instances registered.
